tasks.label: PDS: Verify Tooling
args: $portableGit = 'C:\Users\thomas.sanderson\Appz\git\PortableGit\cmd\git.exe'; $tools = 'python','lazygit','codex','wt'; foreach ($t in $tools) { if (Get-Command $t -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue) { Write-Host "[ok] $t" } else { Write-Host "[missing] $t" } }; if (Test-Path $portableGit) { Write-Host '[ok] portable-git' } else { Write-Host '[missing] portable-git' }

tasks.label: PDS: Extract Plan Benefits CSV
args: $env:PYTHONPATH='src'; if (Test-Path .venv\Scripts\python.exe) { .venv\Scripts\python.exe -m aca_sbc.cli --csv "VIOP CS Tracker(ACA SBCs).csv" --out "out.csv" } else { python -m aca_sbc.cli --csv "VIOP CS Tracker(ACA SBCs).csv" --out "out.csv" }

tasks.label: PDS: Baseline Extract (Checkpointed)
args: $env:PYTHONPATH='src'; if (Test-Path .venv\Scripts\python.exe) { .venv\Scripts\python.exe -m aca_sbc.cli --csv "VIOP CS Tracker(ACA SBCs).csv" --out "out\plan_benefits_baseline.csv" --checkpoint-every 250 } else { python -m aca_sbc.cli --csv "VIOP CS Tracker(ACA SBCs).csv" --out "out\plan_benefits_baseline.csv" --checkpoint-every 250 }

tasks.label: PDS: Resume Extract (Checkpointed)
args: $env:PYTHONPATH='src'; if (Test-Path .venv\Scripts\python.exe) { .venv\Scripts\python.exe -m aca_sbc.cli --csv "VIOP CS Tracker(ACA SBCs).csv" --out "out\plan_benefits_baseline.csv" --checkpoint-every 250 --resume } else { python -m aca_sbc.cli --csv "VIOP CS Tracker(ACA SBCs).csv" --out "out\plan_benefits_baseline.csv" --checkpoint-every 250 --resume }

tasks.label: PDS: Smoke Build Sample CSV
args: $env:PYTHONPATH='src'; if (Test-Path .venv\Scripts\python.exe) { .venv\Scripts\python.exe scripts\make_smoke_sample.py --input "VIOP CS Tracker(ACA SBCs).csv" --output "out\smoke_input.csv" --rows ${input:smokeRows} --mode head } else { python scripts\make_smoke_sample.py --input "VIOP CS Tracker(ACA SBCs).csv" --output "out\smoke_input.csv" --rows ${input:smokeRows} --mode head }

tasks.label: PDS: Smoke Merge Into Plan Benefits Preview
args: $env:PYTHONPATH='src'; if (Test-Path .venv\Scripts\python.exe) { .venv\Scripts\python.exe scripts\merge_smoke_into_plan_benefits.py --base "VIOP CS Tracker(Plan Benefits).csv" --smoke "out\smoke_plan_benefits.csv" --out "out\VIOP Plan Benefits.smoke-merged-preview.csv" } else { python scripts\merge_smoke_into_plan_benefits.py --base "VIOP CS Tracker(Plan Benefits).csv" --smoke "out\smoke_plan_benefits.csv" --out "out\VIOP Plan Benefits.smoke-merged-preview.csv" }

tasks.label: PDS: Lazygit
args: if (Get-Command lazygit -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue) { lazygit } else { Write-Error 'lazygit not found in PATH' }

tasks.label: PDS: Git Preflight
args: $git='C:\Users\thomas.sanderson\Appz\git\PortableGit\cmd\git.exe'; if (-not (Test-Path $git)) { Write-Error 'Portable git not found'; exit 1 }; if (-not (Test-Path .git)) { Write-Error 'Not a git repository at workspace root'; exit 1 }; & $git status --short; & $git branch --show-current

tasks.label: PDS: Create Worktree
args: $git='C:\Users\thomas.sanderson\Appz\git\PortableGit\cmd\git.exe'; if (-not (Test-Path $git)) { Write-Error 'Portable git not found'; exit 1 }; if (-not (Test-Path .git)) { Write-Error 'Not a git repository at workspace root'; exit 1 }; $name='${input:worktreeName}'; $branch='${input:branchName}'; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path .worktrees -Force | Out-Null; & $git worktree add .worktrees/$name -b $branch

inputs.description: Parsing reliability problem statement for swarm
inputs.default: Improve deterministic extraction reliability for ACA SBC fields and reduce blank/error rates.
